channel.title: Comments on: Somerset Rivers – West Lydford Mill Stream
channel.description: Repairing the weir in West Lydford, Somerset

item.title: By: David Jury
item.dc:creator: David Jury
item.description: Good luck with your project. There are several videos of the two weirs that I have on my website. You can view them via this link. http://somersetrivers.org/index.php?module=Content&func=view&pid=106
item.content:encoded:
Good luck with your project. There are several videos of the two weirs that I have on my website. You can view them via this link.
http://somersetrivers.org/index.php?module=Content&func=view&pid=106
